Class GeoPath.PathSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.spatial.spatial4j.geo3d.GeoPath.PathSegment
  • Enclosing class:
    GeoPath

    public static class GeoPath.PathSegment
extends Object
    This is the precalculated data for a path segment.
